Properties.ProtectedString:
ball = script.Parent damage = 80 maxSpeed = 230
function onTouched(hit) local humanoid = hit.Parent:findFirstChild("Humanoid")
if humanoid ~= nil then tagHumanoid(humanoid) local theHurt = damage * math.abs(ball.Velocity.magnitude/maxSpeed) print(theHurt) humanoid:TakeDamage(theHurt) untagHumanoid(humanoid) if theHurt > 30 then if hit.Name ~= "Head" and hit.Name ~= "Torso" then print(hit) hit:BreakJoints() end end ball.Parent = nil end end
function tagHumanoid(humanoid) -- todo: make tag expire local tag = ball:findFirstChild("creator") if tag ~= nil then local new_tag = tag:clone() new_tag.Parent = humanoid end end
function untagHumanoid(humanoid) if humanoid ~= nil then local tag = humanoid:findFirstChild("creator") if tag ~= nil then tag.Parent = nil end end end
connection = ball.Touched:connect(onTouched)
wait(5) ball.Parent = nil

local Tool = script.Parent;
enabled = true
local debris = game:GetService("Debris")
function fire(v)
local vCharacter = Tool.Parent if vCharacter.Name == "Backpack" then return end local vPlayer = game.Players:playerFromCharacter(vCharacter)
local missile = Instance.new("Part")
local spawnPos = vCharacter.PrimaryPart.Position
local PewPew = Tool.Handle:FindFirstChild("PewPew")
if (PewPew == nil) then PewPew = Instance.new("Sound") PewPew.Name = "PewPew" PewPew.SoundId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=33677366" PewPew.Parent = Tool.Handle PewPew.Volume = 1 end
spawnPos = spawnPos + (v * 10)
missile.Position = spawnPos missile.Shape = 0 missile.Elasticity = 0 missile.formFactor = 0 missile.Size = Vector3.new(1.5,1.5,1.5) missile.Velocity = v * 150 missile.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Really black") missile.Material = Enum.Material.CorrodedMetal missile.BottomSurface = 0 missile.TopSurface = 0 missile.Locked = true missile.Name = "CannonBall"
local force = Instance.new("BodyForce") force.force = Vector3.new(0,300,0) force.Parent = missile
local creator_tag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creator_tag.Value = vPlayer creator_tag.Name = "creator" creator_tag.Parent = missile
local new_script = script.Parent.LaserBlast:clone() new_script.Disabled = false new_script.Parent = missile
missile.Parent = game.Workspace
PewPew:Play()
local forceVal = 85000 local force = Instance.new("BodyForce") force.force = Vector3.new(forceVal,forceVal,forceVal) * -v force.Parent = vCharacter.Torso debris:AddItem(force,0.5)
end
function isTurbo(character) return character:FindFirstChild("BoltHelm") ~= nil end
function onActivated() if not enabled then return end
enabled = false
local character = Tool.Parent; local humanoid = character.Humanoid if humanoid == nil then print("Humanoid not found") return end
local reload = 8
if Tool:FindFirstChild("Part") then Tool.Part.Fire.Enabled = true end
local fuseSound = Tool.Handle:FindFirstChild("fuseSound") if fuseSound == nil then fuseSound = Instance.new("Sound") fuseSound.Name = "fuseSound" fuseSound.SoundId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=33677615" fuseSound.Parent = Tool.Handle fuseSound.Volume = 1 end fuseSound:Play()
wait(3) if Tool:FindFirstChild("Part") then Tool.Part.Fire.Enabled = false end local explosion = Instance.new("Explosion")
explosion.BlastPressure = 0 explosion.BlastRadius = 3 explosion.Position = Tool.Handle.Position + (character.Torso.CFrame.lookVector.unit * 5) explosion.Parent = Tool
local targetPos = humanoid.TargetPoint local lookAt = (targetPos - character.Head.Position).unit fire(lookAt) wait(reload)
enabled = true
end
local equipping = false
function onEquipped()
if equipping then return end equipping = true
Tool.Handle.EquipSound:play()
local firePart = Instance.new("Part") firePart.Position = Tool.Handle.Position firePart.Transparency = 1 firePart.Locked = true firePart.formFactor = 2 firePart.Size = Vector3.new(1,0.4,1) firePart.Parent = Tool
local firer = Instance.new("Fire") firer.Color = Color3.new(1,204/255,102/255) firer.Heat = 25 firer.Size = 2 firer.Enabled = false firer.Parent = firePart
local weld = Instance.new("Weld") weld.Parent = firePart weld.Part0 = firePart weld.Part1 = Tool.Handle weld.C0 = CFrame.new(0,-1,-2)
wait(0.1) equipping = false
end
function onUnequipped() if Tool:FindFirstChild("Part") then Tool.Part:remove() end end
script.Parent.Activated:connect(onActivated) script.Parent.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) script.Parent.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)

local Tool = script.Parent; local anim = nil local mouse = nil
Tool.Enable.Changed:connect(function() if mouse then if Tool.Enable.Value == true then mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" else mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" end end end)
function onButton1Down(mouser) mouse = mouser if not Tool.Enable.Value then return end
Tool.Enable.Value = false wait(3) if anim then anim:Play(0.1,1,2) end wait(8) mouse = mouser Tool.Enable.Value = true end
function resetIcon() mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" end
function onEquippedLocal(mouser)
mouse = mouser if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end
if Tool.Enable.Value == true then mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" else mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" delay(8,resetIcon) end mouse.Button1Down:connect(function() onButton1Down(mouser) end) anim = script.Parent.Parent.Humanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.kickback)
end
function onUnequippedLocal()
if anim then anim:Stop() anim:remove() anim = nil end
end
Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal)
